nodes.text: Haskit was a female Bothan who was a matriarch and was able to influence her species' government on the Bothan home planet of Bothawui for fifty years. After her death, she was famous for the role she played in politics, and there were female Bothans who were named after her.

Haskit was first mentioned in the Galactic Campaign Guide, a 2003 sourcebook for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game, written by Peter Schweighofer and J.D. Wiker. She was only described in a table of Bothan female names. In 2008, Haskit received an entry in The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia. Neither source mentions the era she lived in or specifies her homeworld.
